CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Reliability_Rating_Color__c) = 'Yellow' ,IMAGE("https://c.na19.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01513000003A2bk","Yellow",30, 100) , IF( TEXT(Reliability_Rating_Color__c) = 'Red' ,IMAGE("https://c.na19.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01513000003A2bf","Red",30, 100) , IF( TEXT(Reliability_Rating_Color__c) = 'Green' ,IMAGE("https://c.na19.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01513000003A2ba","Green",30, 100) , '') ) )
CustomField.label: Reliability Rating Color Indicator
